control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs virtualization techniques to support the deployment of a diversity of operating systems and applications that are changed [Assignment: organization-defined frequency].
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs realistic, but misleading information in [Assignment: organization-defined information system components] with regard to its security state or posture.

Control Statement: The organization employs virtualization techniques to support the deployment of a diversity of operating systems and applications that are changed [Assignment: organization-defined frequency].
